title: 8g accepts trailing semicolon after import declaration
body:
by **Da.Waterworth**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create a single import statement, without parentheses ()
2. Append a semicolon
3. Compile with 8g

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
A syntax error, as per the go specification.
No syntax error.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux, 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
4a3f8104324e tip

Please provide any additional information below.
ImportSpec       = [ "." | PackageName ] ImportPath .
ImportPath       = StringLit .
